New Records: Andrew Wiggins scored a game-high 24 points, his 10th 20-point game of the season
Dennis Schr√∂der tallied 17 points, his highest scoring output as a Warrior, surpassing his previous Warriors-high 15
Key Match Events: Wiggins scored 18 of his team-high 24 points in the third quarter
Lindy Waters III began the second quarter by scoring eight straight points
Wiggins made his first six field goal attempts in the third quarter, scoring 18 points and hitting three 3-pointers in the frame
Post-Match Reflections: The Warriors improved to 10-8 at home on the season and have won two of their last three games played at Chase Center and three of their last four games overall
The Warriors are winners of two-straight games for the first time since 11/20-11/22
Miscellaneous Highlights: Tonight marked the Warriors' league-high tying 22nd Clutch Game on the season (Minnesota)
The Warriors improved to 11-2 when scoring 120-plus points this season
Andrew Wiggins recorded a season-high four steals
Others: Jonathan Kuminga exited the game with a right ankle sprain
Pat Spencer recorded his first-career block
